java.lang.Object

   +----Drawable
The pure class interface. 
public abstract class Drawable
A drawable object is one which knows how to draw itself using a Drawer object.

Author:
Alan Jeffrey
Version: v1.0 1998/06/09

draw
public abstract void draw(Drawer d);
Draw it.

Parameters:
